ch0330_00_biwa/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s nice to see you!
ch0330_00_biwa/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m all ready to go! Whether it’s training or
battling, count me in!
ch0330_00_biwa/7101_0701_01_10:
Team Star provides an important place for those
who have nowhere else to go—somewhere they
can belong and feel at ease.
ch0330_00_biwa/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s an irreplaceable treasure to all of them...
And to me.
ch0330_00_biwa/7101_0701_03_10:
I’ll show that I can protect it at all costs!
No matter what happens!
ch0330_00_biwa/7102_0701_01_10: My friend made these clothes for me...
ch0330_00_biwa/7102_0701_02_10: He said he was going for an infernal look!
ch0330_00_biwa/7102_0701_03_10: Do they make me look tough? Hehehe!
ch0330_00_biwa/7103_0701_01_10: I used to be a battling coach for Team Star!
ch0330_00_biwa/7103_0701_02_10:
If you’re curious what sort of training we did,
let’s do some together!
ch0330_00_biwa/7103_0701_03_10:
First, let’s try something suited for beginners...
starting with a simple half-day course!
ch0330_00_biwa/7104_0701_01_10:
Taking on new challenges is scary, no matter who
you are.
ch0330_00_biwa/7104_0701_02_10:
Even friends of mine who were normally really
reliable would have to muster all their courage.
ch0330_00_biwa/7104_0701_03_10:
So if you’re ever nervous about doing something
alone, let me know!
ch0330_00_biwa/7105_0701_02_10: I can see it in how your Pokémon look at you.
ch0330_00_biwa/7105_0701_03_10: Building that kind of trust is an incredible thing!
ch0330_00_biwa/7105_0701_04_10:
After all, strengthening your heart and bonds is
way harder than strengthening your body!
ch0330_00_biwa/1701_0701_01_10: There you are! Here, I have a present for you.
ch0330_00_biwa/1701_0702_01_10:
Feel free to let me know if items aren’t enough
and you need help training as well!
ch0330_00_biwa/2501_0701_01_10:
Back at school in Paldea, a friend and I started a
pro wrestling club together!
ch0330_00_biwa/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s a lot of fun, but...are you interested in
pro wrestling?
ch0330_00_biwa/2501_0701_03_10: For example, if you go like this...
ch0330_00_biwa/2501_0701_04_10:
Oh! Sorry! I was about to use a move on you
without even thinking!
ch0330_00_biwa/2501_0702_01_10:
It looks like they hold competitions similar to pro
wrestling once in a while on Pasio, too.
ch0330_00_biwa/2501_0702_02_10:
I look forward to seeing what amazing
showdowns the future has in store!
ch0330_00_biwa/2511_0701_01_10: I used to fight to keep others from getting hurt.
ch0330_00_biwa/2511_0701_02_10:
But...when my friends got worried and told me not
to be so reckless, I realized something.
ch0330_00_biwa/2511_0701_03_10: There are people who’d be sad if I got hurt.
ch0330_00_biwa/2511_0702_01_10:
You’re a really hard worker, too, but don’t push
yourself too much, OK?
ch0330_00_biwa/2511_0702_02_10: Because if you got hurt, I’d be so sad...
ch0330_00_biwa/3001_0701_01_10:
I refuse to give in to sleep...
RAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!
ch0330_00_biwa/3003_0701_01_10:
Let me know if you need to train! I’ll be there for
you as long as you want!
ch0330_00_biwa/3005_0701_01_10:
Let your body rest up after all that hard work you
did today! Hasta la vistar! ★
